articles.title: Roundtable - What does Jordan Addison's decision mean for USC, the Pac-12 and college football? - ESPN
articles.description: Star receiver Jordan Addison announced he'll transfer to USC, instantly upgrading new coach Lincoln Riley's already stacked offense. What impact will his decision have?
articles.content: As the college football world turns, yet another player is bolting for greener (and warmer) pastures. This time, though, it's the best wide receiver in college football. Biletnikoff winner Jordan Add… [+10895 chars]
